name: hup
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to encourage a person or animal to move faster or to work faster: Move! Hup, hup, hup. “Hup, there,” yelled the instructor. “Hup, hup, hup.”
More examplesFewer examplesWe heard the dog drivers saying,"Hup, hup, hup! Good boy!"He ran alongside encouraging them with, “Hup , hup, hup.” Come on! Hup hup!When you yell "Hup!" the dog jumps up and licks you.There was just the occasional “Hup!” as he coaxed one of the animals along.

hup, two, three, four
said by someone who is leading a group of people, especially soldiers, who are marching: He called “forward march,” and counted “hup two, three, four, hup two, three, four.” The police cadets march in military style - "hup, two, three, four!"
